description:
After Ryuji’s all-powerful Orgoth the Relentless dices Yugi’s entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!  Yugi’s last hope rests in one final dice roll in the thrilling conclusion to Dungeon Dice Monsters!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiseki no Dimension: Black Magician Shoukan
Le duel des monstres des dés - Fin de la partie
奇跡のディメンジョン ブラックマジシャン召喚
